Main Activity Code in OnCreate

//{

		StrictMode.ThreadPolicy policy = new StrictMode.ThreadPolicy.Builder().permitAll().build();
		StrictMode.setThreadPolicy(policy); 
		try {
			db = new Database(this);
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		this.updateEventsButton();
		try {
			new EortologioAPI().getFile("http://eortologio.gr/rss/si_av_me_el.xml","http://eortologio.gr/rss/si_av_me_en.xml");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		try {
			new EortologioAPI().readXML();
		} catch (SAXException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (ParserConfigurationException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		
		
		
//}
